Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which I believe would significantly benefit and enhance your endeavors. Given its immense value to you, I propose a special introductory offer. For a limited time only, you have the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at an exclusive price of $750,000. This is a remarkable saving of $50,000 compared to its standard market value of $800,000. I trust this offer will be appealing and encourage you to seize this unique opportunity. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $750,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $750,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
